```{r setup}
library(quollr)
```

```{r, message=FALSE}
gaussian_clusters <- gaussian_clusters(n = 300, with_seed = 123, num_clusters = 3, mean_matrix = rbind(c(1,0,0), c(0,1,0), c(0,0,1)), var_vec = c(0.05, 0.05, 0.05), num_dims = 3, num_noise_dims = 2, min_noise = -0.05, max_noise = 0.05)

langevitour::langevitour(gaussian_clusters)
```
